content: fancy hooking your own beautiful baby blanket this written pattern is for a beautiful baby blanket ideal for the spring / summer a beginner s introduction to filet crochet this pattern uses chain double_crochet and treble stitches finished blanket measures approx 60cms x 66cms and makes an ideal size pram blanket details of how to make a bigger blanket are also provided in the pattern this pattern does not include charts or photographic tutorial the pattern does include a link to make tassels materials you will need aran / worsted weight yarn - pattern recommends a cotton blend 5 0mm crochet hook or hook needed to acquire correct gauge tapestry needle to weave in ends stitch marker optional cardboard to make tassels pattern suitable fora a beginner
